fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Ballot Switching (Day): Switch the King's vote to someone else.
- Blood Test (Night): Discover a player's subalignment (not faction) and if they have the Royal Blood passive.
- Kinslayer (Night, 2 uses): Attack a player who has the Royal Blood passive. Unless they're the King, you must have checked them first. Usable from Night 3.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Can only spawn with a Good King (2028), Evil King (2030), Neutral King (2031), or Psycho King (2032).
- Royal Blood: During elections for a new King, votes for you count twice.
- You become Pretender King (XXXX) when elected, not Neutral King.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be elected to become the Pretender King, then survive to the end of the game.
